metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25286 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
In wp-includes/comment-template.php in WordPress before 5.4.2, commentsfrom a post or page could sometimes be seen in the latest comments even ifthe post or page was not public.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25286` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 6.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
wordpress-l10n - 6.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 6.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 6.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 6.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu1').
